title: Lisson Gallery logotype
content:
I wonder if anyone has any ideas, has the Humanist meets Geometric feel, looks a bit Gill but isn't.  
Thanks in advance

Tim

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019024508im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lisson_5569.jpg)
author: timd

comments.content: looks like ITC Johnston, but the L's dont seem quite right.

Johnston (and New Johnston) were amongst the ones I rejected, but thanks for the thought.  
I have also looked at the obvious contenders Agenda, Metro, Bliss, Geometric 415 etc  
The jpeg has made the underside of the beard of the G seem a bit straighter than it really is.

Tim
